column5: Hey,  I havent really looked around yet, but I have a few rods which I need a random guide here and there....I would definately be looking to replace them with the factory originals..  Anybody know a store locally in toronto/surrounding which would actually carry them in stock, or will I have to order them direct from the company? Any suggestions on a good place to have them install the guides(none are the tip-top guide)  I am looking specifically for fuji titanium framed sic guides ...  thanks for the input  -Mark
Angling Specialties sells components and does custom work.  There's 3 locations in your area, google is your friend.
